alert.note: Alert for Central Aleutians (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:40AM AKST until January 02 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches with highest amounts in Adak. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Central Aleutians. * WHEN...Until 5 PM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. The combination of heavy snow and wind could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could damage property and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy, wet snow is expected across the Central Aleutians. The highest snow amounts are expected for Adak. Temperatures will rise this afternoon and snow is expected to transition to a rain/snow mix or all rain.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
